title: 大型跑酷 - 爬山跑酷 Large parkour-Mountaineering parkour 1.11 ,1.12 ,1.13 ,1.14
author: JA30
txt_content:
大家好我是JA今天來出第二十二部作品此地圖為電腦版地圖此地圖為作者的最後一部作品也是第1次做1.13以上的版本的地圖因為之前對1.13以上版本的指令不太熟所以就沒出1.13以上的地圖現在有一點較熟了Hello everyoneI am JAThe twenty-second work came today.This map is a computer version of the mapThis map is the author's last workIt is the first time to do 1.13Map of the above versionBecause before it was above 1.13The version of the instruction is not familiarSo there is no map above 1.13.I am a little more familiar now.

地圖名：大型跑酷 - 爬山跑酷Map name:Large parkour - Mountaineering parkour
地圖劇情：無Map plot:no
地圖規則：1.勿破壞方塊2.勿作弊3.和平模式4.亮度 隨意5.視野距離  166.冒險模式7.聲音 隨意8. 音樂 隨意Map rules:1. Do not destroy the square2. Do not cheat3. Peace mode4. Brightness5. Field of view distance 166. Adventure mode7. Sound, free8. Music free
遊戲截圖：Screenshot of the game:



遊戲版本：1.11.Ｘ以上版本1.12.Ｘ以上版本1.13.Ｘ以上版本1.14.Ｘ以上版本Game version:1.11.X or above1.12.X or above1.13.X or above1.14.X or above
人數:無限Number of people:unlimited
修改項目：還未有Modify project：Not yet
遊戲載點：game download:
上面On the top


提示：無prompt：no


實況區：Live area:



也請拍照片或錄影片傳至巴哈Please also take a photo or videoPass to Baja
希望您們喜歡這張地圖“若未經允許嚴禁轉載”如有Bug請回覆喔！I hope you like this map."If it is not allowed to reprint without permission"If you have a bug, please reply!
